item.title: History
item.description: The Centre for Environmental Data Analysis (CEDA) has evolved over time as its remit has changed and developed in response to the needs of its user community.

item.title: Mission
item.description: We aim to support environmental science, further environmental data archival practices, and develop and deploy new technologies to enhance access to data.
